text: Ani jevha musane apalya janasamuhacya lokankarita pani magitale tevha amhi pharmavile ki apali kathi dagadavara mara, jyatuna bara srota (jhare) phutuna vahu lagale. Pratyeka samuhane apapala srota januna ghetala (ani amhi pharmavile ki) allahane pradana keleli annasamagri kha va pya ani dharativara utpata (phasada) pasaravita phiru naka
